name: Nasus
title: the Curator of the Sands
lore: Nasus is an imposing, jackal-headed Ascended being from ancient Shurima, a heroic figure regarded as a demigod by the people of the desert. Fiercely intelligent, he was a guardian of knowledge and peerless strategist whose wisdom guided the ancient empire of Shurima to greatness for many centuries. After the fall of the empire, he went into self-imposed exile, becoming little more than a legend. Now that the ancient city of Shurima has risen once more, he has returned, determined to ensure it never falls again.
blurb: Nasus is an imposing, jackal-headed Ascended being from ancient Shurima, a heroic figure regarded as a demigod by the people of the desert. Fiercely intelligent, he was a guardian of knowledge and peerless strategist whose wisdom guided the ancient...
allytips: Paying attention to last hitting with Siphoning Strike will have a large impact at the end of a game.
If you're solo, Spirit Fire is a great way to farm a lane. It can be bad if you're in a lane with 2 and you push too far. Find the right balance between Siphoning Strike last hits and AoE farming.
If you have low defenses, people will focus you down even during your ultimate. Try buying some survivability items even in your DPS builds.
enemytips: While transformed by his ultimate, Nasus is stronger than most champions in the League. Engage him only if you have a clear advantage.
Max rank Wither is a very effective counter to Attack Damage characters, so try to avoid getting caught alone by it.
Nasus is prone to being kited. Try not to engage him at full Health.

riot_spell_q.name: Siphoning Strike
riot_spell_q.description: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Nasus's next basic attack will deal {{ e1 }} (+{{ a2 }}) (+{{ f1 }}) physical damage.

Siphoning Strike permanently gains {{ e2 }} damage if it kills an enemy. This bonus is increased to {{ e4 }} against Champions, large minions and large monsters.

riot_spell_w.name: Wither
riot_spell_w.description: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
riot_spell_w.tooltip: Nasus ages target champion over {{ e3 }} seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by {{ e2 }}%, increasing to {{ e1 }}% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.

riot_spell_e.name: Spirit Fire
riot_spell_e.description: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
riot_spell_e.tooltip:
Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at target location, dealing {{ e4 }} (+{{ a2 }}) magic damage.

For the next {{ e3 }} seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by {{ e2 }}% and are dealt an additional {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage each second.

riot_spell_r.name: Fury of the Sands
riot_spell_r.description: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by {{ bonushealth }} and Armor and Magic Resistance by {{ initialresistgain }}.

While the storm rages, he deals {{ damagecalc }} of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second as magic damage ({{ maxdamagecap }} damage max per second), gains an additional {{ statgainpersecond }} Armor and Magic Resistance each second, and Siphoning Strike has a {{ qcdr*100 }}% reduced cooldown.

riot_spell_i.name: Soul Eater
riot_spell_i.description: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

wikia_skill_i1.name: Soul Eater
wikia_skill_i1.blurb: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Nasus''' permanently has {{pp|3|key=%|showtype=true|12 to 24|1 to 13}} {{sti|life steal|'''bonus''' life steal}}.

wikia_skill_q1.name: Siphoning Strike
wikia_skill_q1.blurb: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nasus's''' next [[basic attack]] within 10 seconds gains {{sti|range|25 '''bonus''' range}} and deals {{tip|physical damage|{{as|'''bonus''' physical damage}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.leveling: {{st|Bonus Physical Damage|{{tt|{{ap|30 to 110}}|Amplified by critical strikes and critical damage}} {{as|(+ ''Siphoning Strike'' stacks)|Siphoning Strike}}}}
wikia_skill_q1.description2: If ''Siphoning Strike'' [[kill]]s its target, '''Nasus''' permanently gains {{as|3 stacks|Siphoning Strike}}, increased to {{as|12|Siphoning Strike}} if its target is a [[champion]], large [[minion]], or large [[monster]].
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* ''Siphoning Strike's'' cooldown will not start until the enhanced attack is used or it expires.
* ''Siphoning Strike's'' bonus range stacks with {{ais|Fury of the Sands|Nasus}}, granting 200 total range.
* ''Nasus'' can gain ''Siphoning Strike'' stacks by last-hitting any targetable enemy units ([[ward]]s, structures, {{ai|Summon: Tibbers|Annie|Tibbers}}, {{ai|Powder Keg|Gangplank}}, {{ai|Prophet of an Elder God|Illaoi|Tentacles}}, {{ai|Void Swarm|Malzahar|Voidlings}}, {{ai|Jack in the Box|Shaco}}, {{ai|Noxious Trap|Teemo}}, {{ai|Shepherd of Souls|Yorick|Mist Walkers}}, {{ai|Eulogy of the Isles|Yorick|Maiden of the Mist}})
* ''Siphoning Strike'' will not generate stacks from secondary units killed by item area-of-effect damage ({{nie|Cleave}}, {{nie|Crescent}}, {{nie|Icy Zone}}).
* ''Siphoning Strike'' will not generate stacks from jungle plants.
* The enhanced attack will apply other [[on-hit effect]]s and can {{tip|critical strike|critically strike}} as normal.
* Only ''Siphoning Strike's'' base damage interacts with {{tip|critical strike|critical strikes}} but the bonus damage will still apply {{sti|life steal}} as well as affect structures.
* If ''Nasus'' is {{tip|blind|blinded}} ''Siphoning Strike's'' enhanced attack will not be consumed.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Wither
wikia_skill_w1.blurb: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nasus''' ages the target enemy champion for 5 seconds, {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 35% and {{tip|cripple|crippling}} them by half that amount, both increasing over the duration.
wikia_skill_w1.leveling:
{{st|Maximum Slow|{{ap|35+3*4 to 35+15*4}}%|Additional Slow Per Second|{{ap|3 to 15}}%}}
{{st|Maximum Cripple|{{ap|(35+3*4)/2 to (35+15*4)/2}}%|Additional Cripple Per Second|{{ap|3/2 to 15/2}}%}}
wikia_skill_w1.notes: * If ''Wither's'' duration is reduced by {{tip|Tenacity}} the effects will apply faster so the maximum values are reached when the shortened duration ends.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Spirit Fire
wikia_skill_e1.blurb: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
wikia_skill_e1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nasus''' unleashes a spirit flame at the target location, dealing {{tip|magic damage|{{as|magic damage}}}} to enemies in the area.
wikia_skill_e1.description2: The flame then remains for 5 seconds, dealing {{as|magic damage}} each second to all enemies within and {{as|reducing their armor}} while they remain, lingering for 1 second.
wikia_skill_e1.leveling2:
{{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{ap|11|19|27|35|43}} {{as|(+ 12% AP)}}|Total Magic Damage|{{ap|110|190|270|350|430}} {{as|(+ 120% AP)}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Armor Reduction|{{as|{{ap|15|20|25|30|35}}% of target's armor}}}}
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * ''Spirit Fire'' grants {{tip|sight}} of the target area (is smaller than the damage area) for a short duration on-cast.

wikia_skill_r1.name: Fury of the Sands
wikia_skill_r1.blurb: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Nasus''' empowers himself for 15 seconds, gaining '''bonus''' {{sti|health|{{as|health}}}}, {{sti|armor|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|magic resistance}}}}, increased size, and {{sti|range|50 '''bonus''' range}} on his basic attacks for the duration.
wikia_skill_r1.description2: While '''Nasus''' is empowered, he deals {{as|magic damage}} to all enemies around him each second, capped at 240, gains '''bonus''' {{sti|armor|{{as|armor}}}} and {{sti|mr|{{as|magic resistance}}}} each second, and {{ais|Siphoning Strike|Nasus}} {{sti|cooldown}} is reduced by 50%.
wikia_skill_r1.leveling2:
{{st|Magic Damage Per Second|{{as|{{ap|3|4|5}}% {{as|(+ 1% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}|Total Magic Damage|{{as|{{ap|45|60|75}}% {{as|(+ 15% per 100 AP)}} of target's '''maximum''' health}}}}<!--
-->{{st|Bonus Resistances Per Second|{{ap|1|2|3}}|Total Bonus Resistances|{{ap|30|65|100}}}}
wikia_skill_r1.notes: * ''Fury of the Sands' '' bonus health is not affected by {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} and ''Nasus'' retains it once the duration ends.
